title: When importing the pre-labeled dataset and download after annotation causes duplicate data?
body:
I have imported a pre-labeled dataset to doccano as admin. I have then asked a colleague of mine to do sequence labelling.
Now, while exporting the labelled dataset, some label are duplicated, see: 

`{
    "annotation_approver": "xxx@yyy.com",
    "id": 6110,
    "labels": [
        [
            171,
            181,
            "ACTION"
        ],
        [
            162,
            168,
            "MODAL"
        ],
        [
            156,
            161,
            "TRIGGER"
        ],
        [
            172,
            181,
            "ACTION"
        ],
        [
            190,
            196,
            "LOCATION"
        ],
        [
            162,
            168,
            "MODAL"
        ],
        [
            3,
            60,
            "CONTENT"
        ],
        [
            72,
            154,
            "CONTENT"
        ]
    ],
    "meta": {},
    "text": "9. The recent https://doi.org/10.1002/ange.201708924 article presents a new approach for the fabrication of ZIF membranes for propylene/propane separation, which should be mentioned  in the review."
}`

Your Environment
---------
<!-- Include details of your environment.-->
*   Operating System: Ubuntu 20.04 LTS
*   Python Version Used: Python 3.8.5
*   When you install doccano: 3 weeks ago
*   How did you install doccano (Heroku button etc): Docker
